document_notes.text:
This update for avahi fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-1000845: Fixed DNS amplification and reflection to spoofed addresses (DOS) (bsc#1120281)

notes.text: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultID: CVE-2017-6519.  Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2017-6519.  Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2017-6519 instead of this candidate.  All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
